title: PBE Site
body: Hello , I would like to know how do I apply for the pbe 2016 from already thank you.

replies.body:
You can sign up for the PBE access on our [PBE signup page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

For complete information on the PBE, check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top), and let me know if you have any questions!
